pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Text into Speech // Convert text into speech (voice file in 'wav' format) with API offered by ITRI TTS (Text-To-Speech service, Industrial Technology Research Institute, Taiwan. http://tts.itri.org.tw/). One main function is given, tts_ITRI(). English and Chinese (both traditional and simplified) are supported, and user can specify the speaker accent, speed and volume. Using this package requires internet connection.
